snippet: A Bolivian first-division soccer club has come up with a great marketing ploy: The Sports Boys team says it has signed on the country's president, Evo Morales, to suit up and play about 20-30 minutes per match....

headline.print_headline: Bolivian Soccer Club Signs on President as Player
headline.main: Bolivian Soccer Club Signs on President as Player

lead_paragraph: A Bolivian first-division soccer club has come up with a great marketing ploy: The Sports Boys team says it has signed on the country's president, Evo Morales, to suit up and play about 20-30 minutes per match.
